question.text:
Find incorrect match with respect to cell organelles given below.

a. ER
b. Golgi bodies
c. Plastids
d. Mitochondria
e. Vacuole
f. Peroxisome
g. Lysosome

options.text: Endomembrane system – a, b, e and g
Glycoproteins, glycolipids and lysosomes formation, site of phosphorylation – b, c, d
Acid phosphatase, heterophagosome, glycolatemetabolism, tonoplast – g, f, e
Binary fission, circular DNA, 80 S ribosome, double membranous – c, d

solution.text: Endomembrane: These membranes divide the cell into functional and structural compartments or organelles. In eukaryotes, the organelles of the endomembrane system include the nuclear envelope, the endoplasmic reticulum, the golgi apparatus, lysosomes, vacuoles, vesicles, endosomes and the cell membrane.
